reviewText: Well, I thought I was buying 13 Blu Ray discs for $40, but regardless of what you see in the photo and description, you will get one disc - Quantum of Solace and ONLY Quantum of Solace..... luckily, Amazon has a great return policy in place, which I immediately took advantage of...
WHAT EVER HAPPENED TO TRUTH IN ADVERTISING Mr. Bezos?  A 13 disc 007 collection for $2.00  Too good to be true for Amazon.  But I'll buy it if it is for real.
